name: Super Simple Garlic Roasted Cauliflower | Fit Foodie Finds
instructions: Preheat oven to 400ºF and prep cauliflower by chopping into smaller florets.
Spread cauliflower onto a baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Season with garlic powder and sea salt. Toss with your hands making sure everything is coated.
Roast at 400ºF for 30-40 minutes. Remove and toss every 10 minutes. Roast until golden brown.
